name: Joe's bizarre adventure
description:
Made for Icoso game jam by Hebcuk Abuzittin#1071

Controls;

wasd or arrow keys to move,

space to jump,

esc to pause the game,

left click to shoot (grappling hook or any other weapon)

E-Q to escalate - deescalate when using grappling hook.

Story Description:

Joe is an unemployed box that is looking for job. He picks a side from his options and changes his future. 

Stuff You Can Do:

There are 3 endings and 2 different kinds of gameplay (gameplay changes according to your decisions). There is also a storymap that you can access in the game by esc > main menu > storymap that shows you what progression you have in  different endings. You can also click to a box, press play and play that part again. The completed storymap image is in screenshots.
